body:
So I'm making this post because well, I'm releasing a pack that I had been working on for a solid 2 weeks on and off (I can get lazy) which is a revamped version of my 2Gud 16x. Tbh idk why I revamped it besides the fact I cringed hard when I found out Squiddie still uses it meanwhile I deleted it from my pack folder and stuck to using 32x packs. Idk how to do pack releases besides putting random screenshots showing off armor, items, particles and things that actually matter so here are the pictures. (Im trash at releasing packs which is why I dont do it often). Enjoy the pack!

Link:
http://www.mediafire.com/file/sjqk5pq5z72rf61/2Gud_Revamp.zip
Pictures:
https://gyazo.com/a7d87ad80d22c47f25cc6c90259772a0
https://gyazo.com/b7eda8590661cf04ad11e30442a8027e
https://gyazo.com/2cf2da4e029abf36f7d5816d9173346b

title: Another Bad Pack Release!

replies.body: Make super HD pack next cuz why not :D
replies.body_tagged: Make super HD pack next cuz why not :D

replies.body: I can try :D highest resolution I have messed with was 64x which is no where near 128x or 512x but once I stop taking naps I can probably dedicate some time to HD packs :)
replies.body_tagged: I can try :D highest resolution I have messed with was 64x which is no where near 128x or 512x but once I stop taking naps I can probably dedicate some time to HD packs :)

reply_to.body_tagged: Make super HD pack next cuz why not :D

replies.body: For me my fps was actually better in the revamp than in the original version, the only time I experienced FPS lag was when a ton of items were on the ground but that's kinda what I expected with higher res items and a bajillion items on the ground. In other words you should be fine Squiddie :D

In other words you should be fine Squiddie :D
